children.text: kṣaṇena yānty eva hi tatra vīrāḥ
kṣaṇena yānty eva hi tatra vīrāḥ
yasyā ahave tu praviśec ca vaktram
nā aśaucaṃ na udakaṃ na agniṃ
mātā ca eva pitā ca eva
tad vadhaṃ tu na taṃ vidyāt
tad vadhaṃ tu na taṃ vidyāt
gṛhe va āpi vane va āpi
na vāpi mauñjair na ca valkaśṛṅkhalaiḥ
na va āpi mauñjair na ca valka-śṛṅkhalaiḥ
āpo hi ṣṭha iti ca brāhmaṃ
